reviews.text: i've ordered salted egg chicken with fried rice from this stall multiple times and they always get my order right. today, i asked my mother to order the same thing and the female staff asked a qn that was never asked from the previous staff. came home to see this pathetic dish. pls educate your cashier what is a salted egg chicken with fried rice. this one salted egg fried rice w chicken.
The kuey teow taste like not cooked enough and bland. Couldnt eat, had to throw. Beef from fried rice raw.
ordered San lor hor fun. bland lack flavour, very little sliced fish. Dish came warm. was charged 50 cents for tuppareware.

I was craving for steamboat and looked for the neighbourhood store for Mookata/ hotpot. I found this place and ordered a set of steamboat for us. They served the cooking tray after wiping with kitchen washcloths which they are using for wiping tables!!!!! And I requested to wash the cooking tray, and yet another one they gave me had crawling animals after putting on stove which I dun even know what they are! The worst place ever to dine! And My craving on a rainy day just disappeared and lost appetite!!!!!!!! They need to close down!
